amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a person to include in the application for a drilling lease an estimate of the economic impact, including job losses, resulting from a worst-case discharge of oil from facilities operating under the lease.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part A of House Report 112-398 to require a person to include in the application for a drilling lease an estimate of the economic impact, including job losses, resulting from a worst-case discharge of oil from facilities operating under the lease.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 236 (Roll no. 63).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 236 (Roll no. 63).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Deutch.
